name: stream-sync
description: Chat bot with viewer count system

scripts.lint: bun scripts/lint/no-raw-timeouts.js && bun scripts/lint/no-mock-timers-in-tests.js && bun scripts/lint/no-implementation-test-patterns.js && bun scripts/lint/no-implicit-test-defaults.js && bun scripts/lint/prefer-double-bang.js && eslint "src/**/*.js" "tests/**/*.js" && knip --config knip.json --include files,unlisted,exports
